verbs.description: WASHINGTON -- The Latest on President Donald Trump and North Korea ( all times local ) : [ARGM-TMP: 2:47 p.m.] [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: his meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un ( kim jawng oon ) is back on for June 12] .

WASHINGTON -- The Latest on President Donald Trump and North Korea ( all times local ) : 2:47 p.m. President Donald Trump says [ARG1: his meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un ( kim jawng oon )] [V: is] [ARG2: back on] [ARGM-TMP: for June 12] .
